title: [Large-Scale] Missile System Aircraft Identification Training: Simulation-Based Intelligent Instructional System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and foundational understanding of radar/navigation systems
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, a course involving understanding missile system aircraft identification algorithms, training in simulation environments, and conducting project-based assessments

learning_goals: The operational principle of an aircraft identification algorithm in missile systems can be explained via mathematical modeling.
Learners can interpret aircraft identification results and apply procedures to diagnose errors in a simulated environment
Learners can complete a team-based project analyzing real-world scenarios to propose improvements for identification systems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
